name: Perfect Feedly Light
description:
Make Feedly bearable for reading feeds. Based on style 89738 by user 194774:
  • Remove color, background and font size definition
  • Remove search categories suggestions
  • Remove facebook and twitter links in sharing tools (hover on feed title)
additional_info:
Changelog:
  • 2016-01-03: hide search promo floating box
  • 2015-05-18: urls are now underlined
